#Learning to reference figures

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, fig.align = "center")
```


##control+option+i = new r chunk
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r Figuref}
x = seq(1:100)
y = rnorm(100)
y

dat = data.frame(x, y)
dat

ggplot(dat, aes(x = x, y = y)) +
  geom_line()

```

This is random noise
